ComicInfo.Summary: Hit-Girl has been secretly training Kick-Ass in martial arts, but she gets caught and makes a promise to her step-father, Marcus Williams, that she will leave her superhero activities behind. Kick-Ass thinks that he needs to move into the next phase in his superhero activities: a superhero league.
